title: How Ya Been? #7 with Louise Pentland
description:
This week on their limited edition podcast, Grace and Mamrie catch up with Louise Pentland and talk Middle Parts, motherhood, running a company and Polly Pocket.

For a limited time, get 25% off and zero delivery fees on your first order of $15 or more when you download the DoorDash app and enter code HHYB.
